message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.DM, cs.NE 

The paper proposes a novel local learning method for classification tasks using the k-nearest-neighbor algorithm. This method involves estimating and organizing additional distribution information in the neighborhood to make classification decisions based on maximum posterior probability. This approach is relevant to several sub-categories in computer science, including machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), computer vision (cs.CV), data mining (cs.DM), and neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE).
